Filename.description: Name of file, to be filled programmatically.

Appraisal Form Type.description: The appraisal form designation found in the document, typically in the footer area below the reconciliation section. Extract any form reference as it appears in the document.

Subject Property Address.description: Full address of the property being appraised.

Effective Date of Appraisal.description: The effective date of the appraisal, could also be the inspection date or date when the appraisal was valued, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

Appraiser Name.description: Name of the person who conducted the appraisal.

Subject Additional Square Footage.description: Numeric square footage value of any additional structures (ADU, basement, casita, JADU) separate from main living area. Return '0' if explicitly stated as 0 sf, empty string if not mentioned.

Document Title.description: The title or name of the document on the first page.

Subject Property Value.description: The appraised value of the subject property (numeric value only).

As-Is Value.description: The as-is value based on reconciliation box or additional comments/addendum. If box 1 ('as is') is checked, this value is from the reconciliation box. If boxes 2-4 are checked, this value is from additional comments/addendum. Return null if not found.

ARV Value.description: The after repair value based on reconciliation box or additional comments/addendum. If boxes 2-4 are checked, this value is from the reconciliation box. If box 1 ('as is') is checked, this value is from additional comments/addendum. Return null if not found.

Sales Comparables.description: Regular sales comparison approach comparables used for current market value.

Comp GLA.description: Gross living area in square feet (numeric value only).

Comp Adjusted Sale Price.description: Final adjusted sale price (numeric value only).

Comp Data Source.description: Where the sale price is coming from, e.g., 'MLS', 'Public Records'.

Comp Lot Size.description: Lot size (numeric value only, in square feet or acres).

Comp Distance.description: Distance from subject property (e.g., '0.25 miles', '1.2 km', '500 feet'). Look for distance measurements on location map or comparable descriptions.

As-Is/ARV.description: Whether this is an 'As-Is' or 'ARV' comparable based on context and sections where it appears.

Comp Additional Square Footage.description: Numeric square footage value of any additional structures (ADU, basement, casita, JADU) for this comparable property. Return '0' if explicitly stated as 0 sf, empty string if not mentioned.

Comp Number and Type.description: The comparable number and section type, e.g., 'Sales Comparable #1', 'Sales Comparable #2'.
